properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:28AM CST until February 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Quad Cities IA IL
properties.description:
...Accumulating snow this afternoon and tonight...

.Snow, possibly mixed with rain to start, will overspread parts
of far northeast Missouri, far southeast Iowa and Illinois this
afternoon and tonight. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
are expected. Significantly colder air will move into the area
Thursday with some blowing snow possible.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Henry IL, Bureau, Putnam and Mercer Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Hazardous conditions
are likely for the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Go to www.gettingaroundillinois.com for road conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
